actions: Nourishes Jing and Blood, fills the Marrow and nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
With Shan Yao and Shan Zhu Yu, for dizziness, a weak and sore low back, impotence and night sweats, due to Kidney and Liver Yin Deficiency.
With Shan Zhu Yu, nourishes Kidney Yin and secures Jing, while restraining urination and sweating.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
With Shan Zhu Yu and Tu Si Zi, for leukorrhea due to Spleen and Kidney Deficiency.
With Shu Di Huang and Shan Zhu Yu, for Kidney Deficiency with night sweats.
Stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes Jing and Body Fluids, tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and strengthens Kidney Yang.
With Shu Di Huang, nourishes Kidney Yin and secures Jing, while restraining urination and sweating.
Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine, calms the fetus and benefits the marrow.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and increases the libido.
With Shan Yao, enhances its functions.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, strengthens the sinews and bones, stops uterine bleeding, calms the fetus, prevents miscarriage, promotes the movement of Blood and alleviates pain.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
With Shu Di Huang, for Heat symptoms due to Yin Deficiency and Devastated Blood.
Tonifies Qi and Blood, strengthens the Spleen and raises the Yang Qi of the Spleen and Stomach.

syndromes: Kidney Yin Deficiency with Empty Fire Rising

symptoms: Aching, soreness or weakness of the low back
Aching in the leg and heel
Low grade fever in the afternoon
Dry throat, maybe recurrent sore throat

notes: Take during the proliferative stage, after menstruation.
